rules_text: You may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Then each opponent may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. If one does, you may repeat this process.
flavor_text:
[i]“See how the wild fox protects the crow? How the crow shares its food with the fox? Harmony, not conflict, is life's true nature.”
—Aurum, Rakkiri elder[/i]
